mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Lee, Robert E. (Robert Edward), 1807-1870
mdRecord.dcterms:description: This letter is not in Lee's hand, though it is signed by him. Mrs. Nichols had written Lee in hopes of receiving some advice or assistance on the subject of some physical ailment afflicting her. (Her letter to Lee is not within the holdings.) Lee regrets to inform Mrs. Nichols that he is unable to be of assistance.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Nichols, A. H.
Get-well cards
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter from R. E. Lee to Miss A. H. Nichols, August 6, 1870 (correspondence)
